Understanding the Interface

The upper portion of the Composite Application Manager interface contains a masthead. The masthead includes a logout button and a link to the online help.

The main portion of the Composite Application Manager interface is divided into a left pane and a right pane.

The left pane contains a tree component. The root node represents the application server. The tree component includes nodes for service assemblies, service engines, and binding components. Each service assembly node contains a subnode for each service unit in the service assembly.

The right pane displays information about the selected node in the left pane.
